title: 'The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip' Season 2 Premiere and 'Southern Charm' Premiere | Morally Corrupt
description:
On this week’s 'Morally Corrupt,' Rachel Lindsay welcomes on Callie Curry and Juliet Litman to discuss the first three episodes of ‘The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip’ Season 2 (1:00). Then the ladies move on to chat about the first episode of Season 8 of 'Southern Charm' (52:00).
Host: Rachel Lindsay
Guests: Callie Curry and Juliet Litman
Producers: Devon Manze, Sasha Ashall, and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Theme Song: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
